mapper.sql: SELECT A.CRS_CRE_CD , A.USER_NO , B.USER_NM , B.MOBILE_NO , B.EMAIL , B.BIRTH , C.USER_ID , A.TCH_TYPE , A.TCH_RATE_SCORE , A.DECLS_NO , A.REG_NO , A.REG_DTTM , A.MOD_NO , A.MOD_DTTM , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.MOD_NO) FROM DUAL) AS MOD_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.REG_NO) FROM DUAL) AS REG_NM FROM TB_CRS_CRE_CRS_TCH A, TB_USR_USER_INFO B , TB_USR_LOGIN C WHERE A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO AND B.USER_NO = C.USER_NO

SELECT A.USER_NO , A.USER_DIV_CD , A.USER_NM , A.PHOTO_FILE_SN , A.BIRTH , A.SEX_CD , A.HOME_POST_NO , A.HOME_ADDR_1 , A.HOME_ADDR_2 , A.HOME_PHONENO , A.MOBILE_NO , A.EMAIL , A.COMP_NM , A.DEPT_NM , A.AREA_CD , A.ORG_CD , ( SELECT ORG_NM FROM TB_ORG_ORG_INFO WHERE ORG_CD = A.ORG_CD) AS ORG_NM , A.COMP_PHONENO , A.COMP_FAX_NO , A.COMP_POST_NO , A.COMP_ADDR_1 , A.COMP_ADDR_2 , B.USER_ID , B.USER_STS , B.REG_NO , B.REG_DTTM , B.MOD_NO , B.MOD_DTTM FROM TB_USR_USER_INFO A, TB_USR_LOGIN B WHERE A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(USER_NO) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END TCH_YN FROM TB_CRS_CRE_CRS_TCH WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CRS_CRE_CRS_TCH ( CRS_CRE_CD , USER_NO , TCH_TYPE , TCH_ODR , TCH_RATE_SCORE , REG_NO , REG_DTTM , MOD_NO , MOD_DTTM ) SELECT #{crsCreCd} , USER_NO , TCH_TYPE , TCH_ODR , null , #{regNo} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmddhh24miss') , #{modNo} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmddhh24miss') FROM TB_CRS_CRS_TCH WHERE CRS_CD = #{crsCd}
mapper.select:
AND EXISTS ( SELECT USER_NO FROM TB_USR_USER_AUTH_GRP WHERE USER_NO = A.USER_NO AND MENU_TYPE = 'HOME' AND AUTH_GRP_CD = #{tchType} ) AND A.USER_NO NOT IN ( SELECT USER_NO FROM TB_CRS_CRE_CRS_TCH WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} )
AND A.ORG_CD = #{orgCd}
AND A.USER_NM||B.USER_ID LIKE '%'||#{userNm}||'%'
ORDER BY B.REG_DTTM
ORDER BY A.USER_NM
ORDER BY A.USER_NM
